Basic Monlon Seeds.Description: Some Monlon made these, planting them will produce a fruit after 2 days.

Fancy Monlon Seeds.Description: A Monlon must've worked really hard on these, it'll blossom in a week but last a long time after!

Rusty Sword.Description: Watch where you're swinging it. No, seriously.

Rusty Hoe.Description: Handing this makes you think of your mom. Tills dirt.

Monlon Fruit.Description: It's for the little guys, is this cannibalism??
